chat.fabadditions.wrong_dimension: The respawn location you are trying to access is in another dimension!
chat.fabadditions.not_enough_xp: You don't have enough experience levels!
item.fabadditions.amethyst_feather.toolt: Teleports you back to your respawn location.
item.fabadditions.interdimensional_feath: Teleports you back to your respawn location across dimensions.
item.fabadditions.phantom_staff.tooltip: Allows you to teleport to other Players.
item.fabadditions.phantom_staff.message: %s wants to teleport to you. (only possible within the next 10 seconds)
Accept that the player teleports to you
item.fabadditions.copper_arrow.tooltip: May create a lightning during thunderstorms.
item.fabadditions.warp_staff.tooltip: Allows you to save and share locations that you and other players can teleport to.
item.fabadditions.pylon_staff.tooltip: Allows you to save multiple locations that you can teleport to.
item.fabadditions.warp.view.name: Available locations to teleport to
